# makeIterator()

**Instance Method**

Returns an iterator over the contents of the data.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeIterator() -> Data.Iterator
```

## Discussion

The iterator will increment byte-by-byte.

## Iterating Over Bytes

- **enumerateBytes(_:)**: Enumerates the contents of the data’s buffer.

items.description: Enumerates the contents of the data’s buffer.
